Projects

AI-Powered Mock Interview System

An advanced AI-based web application that simulates real-time technical interviews using AI agents. Built with React, Firebase, and Gemini AI, this tool helps users prepare for job interviews with personalized questions, voice interaction, feedback, and performance analytics.

To provide a realistic, interactive mock interview experience that enhances user confidence and readiness through dynamic AI-generated questions, voice analysis, and facial expression tracking — all within a browser-based platform.

See Live Source Code

SafeLink-Analyzer

SafeLink Analyzer is an AI-powered web application designed to detect phishing and malicious URLs using machine learning. Trained on a dataset of over 300 real-world URLs, the model enables accurate, real-time classification of suspicious links to help both everyday users and cybersecurity learners stay protected online.

The tool features a user-friendly Streamlit interface with added capabilities like PDF report generation, voice and screen recording, and UI customization. Tested by 50+ users, it offers a secure and accessible platform for proactive threat detection and analysis.
